title: Buying the RAREST Consoles from Japan
description: In this video, I go on a shopping spree for some of the rarest and most unique gaming consoles from Japan using Sendico. From colorful GameCube to failed Apple experiments, I unbox a ton of retro gaming history - though getting them all working proves to be a challenge. Join me as I explore these forgotten gems and see if they were worth importing after all these years.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Ordering 1:57 Unboxing 3:43 Red PS3 Slim 5:36 Panasonic 3DO 8:00 NIntendo 3DS LL Charizard 11:00 Blue PS2 13:21 PSX Catalog 14:00 3DO Part 2 16:30 Orange GameCube 19:58 Apple Pippin Atmark
